events.message: I received the wrong size for my order and would like to request a refund or exchange as soon as possible because the item doesn't fit.
The customer's issue has been classified under refund due to the request for a money back or exchange related to size mismatch.
The support case has been assigned to an agent specialized in handling refund requests and exchanges.
Hello! I’m sorry to hear about the issue with your order. I’m here to help you with the refund or exchange process.
Could you please provide the order number and a photo of the item received? This will help us process your refund or exchange accurately.
Sure, the order number is 123456789. I have attached a photo showing the size label and the product received, which unfortunately doesn't fit me.
Thank you for the details. We will initiate a refund for the order immediately and send you a prepaid return label to ship the item back to us.
That sounds good, thank you for the quick response and the prepaid label to return the incorrect item.
We have processed your refund successfully and you should see the amount credited back to your original payment method within 3-5 business days.
Just checking in to ensure you received your refund and if there is anything else we can assist you with.
We are closing this case now since the refund was completed and the customer did not report any further issues.
A customer satisfaction survey has been sent to gather feedback on the support experience and the refund process.
